# readWriteFailure

**Type Property**

An error indicating a failed read/write operation.

## Declaration

```swift
static var readWriteFailure: HMError.Code { get }
```

## Detecting read and write errors

- **readWritePartialSuccess**: An error indicating a partially successful read/write operation.
